description: Kish was an ancient city of Sumer located east of Babylon in Mesopotamia. Kish was occupied from the Jemdet Nasr period (ca. 3100 BC) until its abandonment under the Seleucids.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Tell Uhaimir and Ingharra
